name: Rehabilitative Assistance for People in Distress (RAPID)

address: Govind Niwasa, Opp Karnataka Bank, Station Road, Malamaddi, Dharwad

briefDescription: Young widows and deserted women and those coming from BPL families (age group of 18-40 years) lack higher education, family support and are also low in confidence due to the situation they are facing, they do not get sustained livelihood options.  Our project identifies these women, counsel, conduct vocational training leading to a meaningful employment. And in some of the cases support them to start self-employment.In last few years the organization has supported more than 3000 of these kinds of women which have lead to positive growth in the region/society.
